page.title: 03A HOUSE IN WHEATHAMPSTEAD(2)
page.content: The windows are double glazed.The walls in the dining room are artexed.The lights look like candles with a shade.The chairs and the table are all Elm.In the sitting room there are some tapestries on the wall and also in the sitting room there are patio doors.In one of the bedrooms there is a computer and an Intertelevision game.In the bathroom there is a washbasin, a toilet and a bath with a shower.The walls are artexed and painted.The floor is carpeted.The kitchen has a cooker,fridge,sink and cupboards.In one of the bedrooms there is a swinging chair with some teddies on them and that is my sisters bedroom.My mum and dads bedroom is mauve with lots of ornaments on the shelves. I like living in this house a lot and I would not like to leave it at all.
